data.comment: Lee Stephen Mason blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Scott Kashket (Wycombe) gets a yellow card.
Wycombe make their first substitution with Alex Samuel replacing David Wheeler.
In the minute 60, Gareth Ainsworth is making the team's second substitution at Adams Park with Garath McCleary replacing Scott Kashket.
Marcus Forss is on a sub for Saman Ghoddos for Brentford.
At Adams Park, Anthony Stewart has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 70, Brentford's Sergi Canos has been booked in Wycombe.
Fred Onyedinma is replacing Dominic Gape for the home team.
Tarique Fosu is replacing Sergi Canos for Brentford at Adams Park.
In the minute 81, The away team replace Bryan Mbeumo with Vitaly Janelt.
Daryl Horgan for Wycombe has been booked by Lee Stephen Mason and receives a first yellow card.
That's full-time at Adams Park. The final score is 0-0.
Ivan Toney (Brentford) has received a yellow card from Lee Stephen Mason.
